amendment.description: An amendment numbered 92 printed in the Congressional Record to exclude the participation, including in any lease auction that occurs pursuant to such plan, by any corporation or entity that the Secretary determines contributed to price gouging in the oil and gas sector in 2022.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to authorize the participation by any corporation or entity that the Secretary determines contributed to price gouging in the oil and gas sector in 2022, including in any lease auction that occurs pursuant to such plan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bowman amendment (A067) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 229 (Roll no. 88).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A067) offered by Mr. Bowman.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bowman amendment (A067) Failed by recorded vote: 201 - 229 (Roll no. 88).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
